attachments.fallback: [March 24th, 2020 10:48 AM] hohete: Hi <@U010NBXJN06> the Ethiopian Fashion Designers Association has reached out offering to manufacture masks. Especially as they have had orders canceled and/or postponed indefinitely due to the current situation
attachments.text: Hi <@U010NBXJN06> the Ethiopian Fashion Designers Association has reached out offering to manufacture masks. Especially as they have had orders canceled and/or postponed indefinitely due to the current situation

text: <@U010787AZ2T>, please share private resource mobilization efforts here also.

elements.text: , please share private resource mobilization efforts here also.

text:
Hi everyone, 

Forgive me if this is redundant (just joined today and trying to find my way around!). I'm curious about what manufacturing capabilities Ethiopia has that could be co-opted for COVID supplies, and if there's already been a push to do that? Many different types of machines could be repurposed for PPE manufacturing, from textiles to molding and cutting equipment. Has there been an effort to look into this yet? If not would be happy to do the research!

elements.text:
Hi everyone, 

Forgive me if this is redundant (just joined today and trying to find my way around!). I'm curious about what manufacturing capabilities Ethiopia has that could be co-opted for COVID supplies, and if there's already been a push to do that? Many different types of machines could be repurposed for PPE manufacturing, from textiles to molding and cutting equipment. Has there been an effort to look into this yet? If not would be happy to do the research!

text:
Hey <@U010NBXJN06> - no forgiveness needed. Yes all of your questions are what we are working on with this and the DIY gear channel.

There are discussions about DIY gears with both cloth and 3D technology. We have some research data for the types of materials that are being across the world.
At the moment, I have reached out to 2 people that have factories in Ethiopia. Haven't heard back yet but there will be other logistical details like funding and distribution.
If you are able to help with any type of research, that would be great. Here is the location of the work being done so far..
<https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1ExKZocP4wmRfNCQF9chKWypMLOEsVMYe?usp=sharing>

Let me know if you have any questions.
